pathAssistantSteps.info: • ‘Accepted’ indicates that the endowment donation is agreed by donor for donation to QUT.
• ‘Cancelled’ indicates that the endowment donation for a cause has been cancelled by the donor.
• ‘Completed’ indicates that the proposed endowment donation for a cause has been received by QUT.
• ‘Declined’ indicates that the proposed endowment donation has been declined by the donor.

• ‘Proposed’ indicates that you have proposed a donation for a cause with a prospective donor.
  • Complete the ‘Donation Summary’ section under the ‘Details’ tab by updating the ‘Payment Type’, and ‘Donation Comment’ fields. Other fields are pre-populated; however, may be updated.
  • Use ‘Notes’ to record relevant information to help you manage the donation. Use the ‘Activity’ panel to record your interactions and track tasks.
  • Record the documents that have been created with links to where they are stored under the 'Documents’ tab.
